mapper.insert: insert into qw_company_assessment (pk_id, fk_dept_id, data_sources_type, assessment_type, start_date, end_date, explain, input_person, input_time, verify_status ) values( cistsys.SEQ_QW_DEPT_TEST.nextval, #{fk_dept_id}, #{data_sources_type}, #{assessment_type}, to_date(#{start_date},'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{end_date},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{explain}, #{input_person}, to_date(#{input_time},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), 0 )

insert into qw_company_assessment_metrics (pk_id, fk_comp_assessment_id, fk_topic_id, metrics_num ) values( cistsys.SEQ_QW_COMPANY_METRUCS.nextval, #{fk_comp_assessment_id}, #{fk_topic_id}, #{metrics_num} )

insert into qw_operation_log (pk_id,fk_relation_id,data_before,data_after,edit_reason,edit_time,fk_edit_user_id, ip_address,business_type) values(cistsys.SEQ_QW_OPERATION_LOG.nextval, #{fk_relation_id}, #{data_before}, #{data_after}, #{edit_reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{edit_time},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #{fk_edit_user_id}, #{ip_address}, 1 )
mapper.select: select attachment_source,pk_id from qw_assessment_attachment where fk_relation_id=#{fk_relation_id}
mapper.update: update qw_company_assessment set fk_verify_person_id=#{fk_verify_person_id}, verify_time=sysdate, verify_status=#{verify_status}, record_invalid_reason=#{record_invalid_reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, verify_not_pass_reason=#{verify_not_pass_reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pk_id=#{pk_id}
mapper.select: select topic_name from qw_appraise_topic where pk_id=#{pk}
